Description:
672m2 OF LAND TO FURTHER DEVELOP WALK TO CLAYTON CENTRAL!
Situated in one of Clayton's finest streets is this wonderful 3 bedroom home appealing to both the homebuyer, investor and the developer within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre, local schools, parklands and Clayton Central Shopping District will sure get the blood boiling in anyone looking to renovate/multi-develop on this massive block of land.
Comprising: 3 large bedrooms, central bathroom with separate toilet, a generous allotment of 672 sqm approx. with fantastic dual occupancy potential to develop at the rear or multi-unit development site (S.T.C.A.).
Land Dimension: 15.14m x 45.68m = 672sqm approx.
Deposit: 10%
Settlement: 30/60 days
Insights: 10 Kimbarra Street, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Where Character and Location Come Together!
Exuding warmth and character throughout, this immaculately presented home is endowed with beautifully landscaped gardens both front and back, light filled accommodation, stunning timber kitchen which overlooks the large decking offering a great entertaining space with quality cafe blinds to keep the elements at bay.
Featuring: North facing, formal entry, timber wall panelling, 2 spacious bedrooms with outside studio/workshop/3rd room, lounge with Coonara heating, space for multiple cars, ducted heating, air-conditioning, timber venetians, bus stops at the end of the street, Keeley Reserve park at the other end and walking distance to Clayton shops and train station.

Description:
Safe and Extra Secure with so much to offer
Sale by Set Date 18/3/2014
This quiet and safe haven is ready to be yours. If you're looking for a well planned home that has so much room for a family and plenty of front and rear yard space, this is the one! The spacious living flows into the dining and is a perfect spot for family gatherings. Meals can be prepared in the gorgeous kitchen with newly installed stove & oven. The three bedrooms are tucked away and best of all is the rear undercover alfresco with gas plumbing and washing facilities - the prime location for all of your family gatherings. This is truly the safe and secure home you've been waiting for.
Nestled behind the established trees and away from the hustle and bustle is this quiet home. Head up the driveway, into this brick home and be welcomed by timber floors of the living area. Opening from here is the dining which freely flows through to kitchen which will be a pleasure for any chef. The other half of the home is well complimented by the three carpeted bedrooms, all with built in robes, plus a central bathroom separate toilet and laundry with access to the rear.
If you love entertaining on a large scale, the alfresco with gas plumbing and kitchen sink will allow you have parties and celebrations all year round. In addition to this, there's a bit of a garden, shed, 2500 Litre water tank and under the home storage. Let's not forget this home has downlights in parts, a huge double lock up garage plus a 3 vehicle carport, alarm, gas heating and cooling and 5 kilowatt solar panels that will MAKE YOU money! With a location like this close to schools, parks, bus stops and shops in every direction, you'll find it hard to not inspect this extra safe home. To build towards your future and enjoy the good life, make sure you call today!
Photo ID Required
Janina Ksiezycka : 0422 991 439
Insights: 715 Heatherton Road, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Exceptional Modern Elegance! Even Greater Location!
Brand new double storey townhouse 6 Star Energy Rating
This magnificent brand new townhouse is perfectly situated in one of Clarinda's finest streets with privacy & peaceful surroundings. Architecturally designed to the highest standards and opposite the leafy green Bald Hill Park, this will sure to excite you!
As you walk into this fabulous architecturally designed home with high ceiling, the flowing floor plan will lead you to the elegant open living room with modern open kitchen and separate dining area, spacious bedrooms with built-in-robes, two master bedrooms with ensuite, plus balcony with park view in one of master bedroom upstairs, modern family bathroom and laundry room, plus sliding doors leading to the beautiful alfresco with timber decking, perfect for entertaining family and friends.
Comprising: Tasmanian Oak hardwood floors through out, living room, family/ meals area, 4 robed bedrooms, ensuite to two master bedrooms, central bathroom, 40mm stone benchtops, 700mm Blanco stainless steel cooktop, 750 Blanco oven and rangehood, dishwasher, powder room, ducted heating and evaporative cooling system, 2000L water tank, remote controlled garage and much, much more!
All conveniently located within minutes to Clayton Central Shopping District, local schools, public transport, Monash Medical Centre & Monash University, what more can you want?
Inspect and make an offer!
*Please note: images are for advertising purposes only and does not reflect the actual property.

Description:
Attention First Home Buyers and Investors.
Great opportunity to enter the property market. This neat, spacious two bedroom brick unit in convenient Clayton South makes it easy. Secreted in a boutique development on a quiet street, this property has everything you need. Relax in a generous lounge with room to entertain before preparing meals in the family-sized kitchen with gas appliances, plenty of storage and a casual meals area. A choice of two bedrooms with storage and access to a practical central bathroom. Benefits include garage, heating and excellent proximity to Westall Station and Clayton Station and Shopping Centre, Monash Medical Centre, Keeley Reserve and popular schools. A unique chance to invest, add value or 'stake your claim' on a first home at a most affordable price

Positioned in close proximity to an array of conveniences including Clayton and Westall Stations, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, various shopping centres and the Monash Freeway, this unique, vintage weatherboard offers a multitude of options and potential plus on a generous block of 696m2 (approx). Comprising a comfortable living area with hardwood floors, wood burning heater and split-system; adjoining a dining zone with a breakfast bar partially segregating the two areas; overlooked by an original kitchen. In addition, a sunroom, two bedrooms, bathroom, laundry, rear pergola, carport and a double garage complete. Renovate or develop (STCA) the choice is yours!

Description:
Modern Living or Great Investment
Ideally located near public transport, schools, parks, Clayton Shopping Centre, Train Station and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre and Monash University. This modern and spacious single level unit feels more like a house and will suit buyers looking for a place to live in or for smart investors. This immaculate property comprises three good sized bedrooms with BIR's, large family bathroom with spa bath and separate toilet, open plan living and dining area opening to entertainment deck, quality kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, separate laundry and single lock up garage. Appealing extra's include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and security alarm. Located in a private and secure position with all amenities being just around the corner. This great property could be the one for you! Call today.

Description:
***UNDER OFFER***
Magnificent one owner brick residence positioned on a vast allotment of over 1000 square meters enjoying a prized locale minutes to Clayton Shopping Centre, train station and Monash Medical Centre offers an outstanding opportunity for a multi-unit redevelopment (S.T.C.A). With the comfortable existing 4 bedroom residence that includes formal living and dining room, family room and well equipped kitchen overlooking a generous sunroom, the existing home could be easily incorporated into your plans or leased out whilst awaiting approval. Either way this is one of the best opportunities to come onto the market.
Land: 18.3m x 54.9m (60ft x 180ft) approx.
Charlie Darlow : 0409 140 191
Insights: 6 Barton Road, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Developers and Investors - 877sqm Endless Possibilites!
Fantastic opportunity to secure this large family home located within walking distance to Clayton shops, train station, schools and parks as well as only minutes away from Monash University and Monash Medical Centre. Property comprising formal entry opening to spacious lounge and dining rooms, kitchen with gas cooking, 4 large bedrooms, family bathroom with separate toilet and laundry, plus another powder room. A big double garage has been converted to a beautiful party room which could easily be used as self contained accommodation, including kitchenette with gas cooking, sink and beautiful Coonara fire place. Complemented by double carport, couple of garden sheds, built in BBQ, gas heating, air-conditioning, alarm and roller shutters to all windows. This magnificent property on a huge 877 sqm approx of land with extra wide 66 foot frontage presents a unique opportunity for future development and investment. Call today.
Insights: 48 Bevan Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
This could be the One!
Perfectly presented, this 3 bedroom home offers a relaxed and convenient lifestyle making it an ideal choice for first-home buyers and investors. Situated within walking distance to public transport and only a few minutes' drive to Clayton Shopping Centre, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University,
Outside, enjoy your low maintenance courtyard, and massive versatile double lock up garage. Meanwhile, inside find a formal living room, kitchen with meal area, 3 bedroom all with built in robes (master bedroom with semi-ensuite), ducted gas heating system and air conditioning.
This property has all the right charm and character, while allowing the future owner to put their own touches and mark onto the property.

Description:
BIG Block = BIG Opportunity!
If you've been looking for a property that has potential to subdivide, or perhaps just need the extra space...this could be for you! Special features include; 3 spacious bedrooms, main bathroom, a country-style updated kitchen and a separate lounge. There's ducted heating throughout, evaporative cooling and gas appliances.
The large block has potential to subdivide (S.T.C.A) or would be ideal for the kids and pets to roam and there is a pergola, perfect for outdoor entertaining in the warmer months. At the rear of the property there is a recently developed childrens playground on Council land and car accommodation is supplied by a large double steel garage with plenty of “off-street” parking.
It's hard to find a block this size in a quiet court location...be quick!
Photo ID Required
Daniel Pepperell
Insights: 4 Bronwyn Court, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
A MODERN & SPACIOUS STREET FRONT TOWNHOUSE
With its street front position on a corner block, this modern and spacious townhouse feels more like a house than many units cramped into large developments. Designed for a low maintenance lifestyle the home features a generous lounge room with an adjoining dining room and a pristine timber kitchen with stainless appliances including an electric oven and gas cook top. Upstairs there's an open study nook as well as 2 generous bedrooms with built in wardrobes and the main even opens up to a tiled balcony. The family bathroom is complemented by a downstairs powder room and there are extras including ducted heating, an air conditioner and a single garage with internal access. The back courtyard is private and easily maintained while allowing room for entertaining, playing and relaxing. Well positioned with Namatjira Park at one end of the street and buses at the other, the home is also within walking distance of central Clayton and its shops, cafes and train station.
Insights: 9 other 2 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern stunner with own street frontage
This brand new one of a kind stunning residence of approx 22 squares boasting its own street frontage will definitely impress with its contemporary class and flawless finish. Located within an easy walk to Clayton shops, train station, buses, parklands schools & Clayton Community Centre (incorporating public library, gym & swimming pool). Comprising living room, separate dining, family room, 3 generous bedrooms, 4th bedroom/study/upstairs retreat, master bedroom with ensuite, stunning modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, central bathroom, ducted heating and vaccum, remote lockup garage with carspace and private courtyard. Other features include solar hot water with gas booster, 3,000 litre watertank and 6 star energy rating.
George Korderas : 0417 521 080

Description:
Ideal First Home, Downsizer or Investor!
This fantastic two bedroom town residence will appeal to first home buyers, downsizers and astute investors alike. Presenting a rare and fantastic opportunity within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library), Clayton Central Shopping District and Monash Medical Centre, 2 minute walk to bus stop which will take you to Monash University.
Featuring: 2 large bedrooms with built-in-robes, ducted heating, large split cooling system, spacious open-plan living and dining room that flows to a well equipped kitchen, large central bathroom, separate toilet, large private courtyard and single lock-up garage.
Disclaimer: We have in preparing this document used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained in this document is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements in this document. Prospect purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document.
Insights: 3/40 Manoon Road, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2013 and 9 other 2 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
New for You and Savings Too - 3 Sold Only 1 Left.
Here is another great opportunity to secure a brand new townhouse, save up to $20,000 on stamp duty and use your first home buyers grant of $10,000 for even greater savings. This townhouse was going to be kept by the owner for their own portfolio but is now being released for ONE lucky purchaser and is considered to be one of the best townhouses in the area. With its own street frontage and NO COMMON LAND, this luxurious 21 square (approx) home will suit either a home buyer or investor that see great value for money and also an opportunity to get started in property with a new home. With a recreational park with children's play equipment next door, this is a great location to bring up a young family. Westall Train Station is only minutes away and Clayton Shopping Strip, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University are also close.
This
home consists of 3 bedrooms plus a study with built in desk (master includes ensuite), Laundry that leads into lock up garage, Kitchen (with stainless steel cooking equipment), meals/living that opens onto an al fresco entertaining area, upstairs includes bedrooms, a bathroom and a kids retreat. Other features include a 2500 litre water tank, a large garden shed for storage, ducted heating, secure lock up garage, 7 year builders warranty and the pleasure of being the first person to live in this brilliant new home.
An inclusions schedule is available upon request offering another benefit which is the ability to alter some of the interior finishes suiting your own personal taste. There are NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS as all you will need is a 10% holding deposit and the balance is paid upon completion.
Dean Sirianni : 0400 446 186
Insights: 2/41 First St, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2009 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
It's the Perfect Beginning or Enticing Investment
An idyllic north facing, streetfront position and a compact block highlights the attraction of this single-level home offering beautifully spacious proportions ideal as a brilliant foot-in-the-door to a sought-after location, profitable investment or future new home site. Appealing light filled spaces filter through a spotless central kitchen leading off to expansive living and dining zones, tidy bathroom and 4 bedrooms all with built-in robes presenting an enticing basis to completely renovate this home to match today's lifestyle requirements (STCA). Whether from owner occupier or investment considerations, this exciting opportunity is walking distance to train station, Clayton strip shops, schools and Monash Medical Centre.
Insights: 1/1256 Centre Road, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.
